actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: A bill to designate 3 counties in the State of Montana as High Intensity Drug Trafficking Areas and authorize funding for drug control activities in those areas.

summary.text: Designates Yellowstone, Missoula, and Cascade counties in Montana as part of the Rocky Mountain High Intensity Drug Trafficking Area under the program administered by the Office of National Drug Control Policy. Authorizes appropriations for drug control activities in such areas.

titles.title: A bill to designate 3 counties in the State of Montana as High Intensity Drug Trafficking Areas and authorize funding for drug control activities in those areas.
